original_title: UFC Fight Night 132: Cowboy vs. Edwards
overview: UFC Fight Night 132: Cowboy vs. Edwards was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on June 23, 2018, at Singapore Indoor Stadium in Kallang, Singapore. A welterweight bout between former UFC Lightweight Championship challenger Donald Cerrone and Leon Edwards headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 132: Cowboy vs. Edwards
